name: minimal-lightbox
description: A minimal Medium.com-style lightbox for enlarging media using css transforms, scaling images from their position on a page

scripts.compile: browserify -t [ babelify --optional runtime ] src/Zoomable.js -o dist/minimal-lightbox.js && postcss --use autoprefixer src/styles.css -o dist/minimal-lightbox.css

author: Matt Shwery <mshwery@gmail.com> (http://mattshwery.com)
